short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjusts windows position when pressing Ctrl+N so it stays in the same place as the previous window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Normally, when you use Ctrl+N to open a non-maximized new window, it is slightly offset down and to the right of the previous window. This extension fixes this so the new window will exactly overlap the previous window.
